sample.name: antcompile
sample.title: Ant Compile Sample
sample.description: Shows how multiple JRXML files can be compiled in batch mode using ANT.

feature.name: antcompile
feature.title: Compiling Multiple Report Template Files Using the Ant Build Tool
feature.description: Properties with this prefix introduce JPA implementation specific EJBQL query hints to be used by the JRJpaQueryExecuter. The suffix is the name of the hint, as documented by the specific JPA implementation.
